mapper.insert: insert into t_board (icategory,title, ctnt, iuser) values (${icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt , B.nm AS writernm, B.profileimg FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC

SELECT A.icategory ,A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt, A.lastip , B.nm as writernm, B.profileimg, C.nm as categorynm FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_board_category C ON A.icategory = C.icategory WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.iboard = ${iboard}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_board
title = #{title},
ctnt = ${ctnt},
lastip = #{lastip},
isdel = 1
WHERE iboard =${iboard}
AND iuser = ${iuser}
